description:
Unleash your full potential with a 4-season boot that meets the technical demands of the modern alpinist. Boasting a warmth-to-weight ratio that's off the charts, the G-Tech lets you move quickly through the most challenging mountain terrain. With the nearly indestructible BOA® Fit System, you can make on-the-fly micro-adjustments, even when wearing gloves. The outsole is made from two different densities, offering you the best of both worlds: grip in the front for climbing and comfortable shock absorption in the heel.

  • Stretch Honey-Comb Guard™ synthetic upper with TPU Mudguard Shield is durable and exceptionally lightweight
  • Core-Wrap™ Shell with structured overlap balances optimal weight and warmth
  • BOA® Fit System provides a secure fit that allows micro-adjustability on the go
  • Rubber Guard™ Side Wall rand protects against abrasions
  • Weatherproof zipper and built-in gaiter with water-resistant internal gusset keep feet warm and dry
  • 6mm inner boot with Velcro closure has flex zone inserts for ease of movement
  • 5mm Carbon Z-Therm™ insulating carbon insole for warmth and vibration dampening
  • Resoling platform lets you replace the entire sole or just the front section to extend the life of your boots
  • Vibram® Dura Step Rubber Compound provides excellent grip in cold and wet terrain
  • Vibram® Ice-Tech™ Tread is divided in two sections that allows optimal performance during both the climb and descent
  • Vibram® Litebase Climbing Zone Platform in the front section and Vibram® Spring-Lug with Impact Brake System™ in the heel for maximum comfort and shock absorption
  • Compatible with all crampon systems
name: La Sportiva G-Tech Mountaineering Boots - Men's
